{{Wireless embedded system |brand=EnGenius |model=ESR7750 |upc=655216004016 |asin=B002JUECW6 |est_release_date=07/31/2009 |fcc_date=06/22/2009 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=Senao |availability=common |type=wireless router |fcc_id=U2M-SR7750 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.25 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT3052 |cpu1_cspeed=384 |cpu2_brand=Ralink |cpu2_model=RT2880 |cpu2_cspeed=266 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV320DTTI-70G |fla2=2 |fla2_brand=Macronix |fla2_model=MX29LV160DBTI-70G |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM63A165TS-6G |ram2=16 |ram2_brand=EtronTech |ram2_model=EM639165TS-6G |serial=yes,, 2x 4-pin header,, unpopulated |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT3052 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi2_chip1_model=RT2880 |wi2_chip2_brand=Ralink |wi2_chip2_model=RT2850 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=00:02:6F |oui_eth=00:02:6F }} Two separate routers in one: RT2880+RT2850 provides 2.4GHz/5GHz and RT3052 provides 2.4GHz
Simultaneous Dual-Band
10/100 Ethernet
[http://www.engeniustech.com/resources/ESR-7750_DataSheet.pdf Datasheet]
[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/31142-new-to-the-charts-engenius-esr7750-300mbps-dual-band-wireless-n-router On SmallNetBuilder] The [http://www.dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/Supported_Devices DD-WRT wiki] lists the Sitecom WL-328 as being an ESR7750.
